value: hall
The annual meeting is being held at the city hall.
The hall is filled with nobles and the richest people of the region.
So, according to this claim, Mr. Nicolas has failed his contract agreement.
Do you acknowledge it?
Yes, but it wasn't my fault.
My storage was set on fire!
set
You know this can't be used for your defense.
You've broken the business agreement and now you have to pay the fine.
Gh... But I'll be going bankrupt because of this!
This isn't the city's issue.
If you can't make your deals, you shouldn't accept them in the first place.
I agree with Ms. Annet. We will have to seize your property in the name of the city.
Please provide an escort to Mr. Nicolas, the meeting is over.
Damnit, I've been set up!..
blackscreentransition
Another hard issue resolved, friend?
Indeed, I must thank you for your cooperation.
I knew it was the right decision to introduce you to the committee.
You scratch my back, and I'll scratch yours, right?
True, now if you excuse me, I have other business to take care of.
footstep
Heh, humans are really easy.
